measured_by: two-dimensional location judgment task (placing 57 cities on geographic maps)
justification: In the empirical study, participants "indicated the position of each of the 57 cities" on seven maps; these location judgments were used to assess their knowledge of where the cities are located.
construct: Geographical location knowledge of European cities

measured_by: E_i competence parameter within CCT-2D model
justification: The article explains that "smaller values of E_i reflect a higher competence since judgments are closer to the cultural truth," making the model’s E_i parameter the quantitative measure of each informant’s competence.
